document.full_text: fifa is likely to discover on sunday if next week's presidential election can go ahead as both candidates, incumbent sepp blatter and challenger mohamed bin hammam, face an ethics committee hearing.
document.title: fifa election under threat as ethics committee meets
lines_and_colors: fifa is likely to discover on sunday if next week's presidential election can go ahead as both candidates, incumbent sepp blatter and challenger mohamed bin hammam, face an ethics committee hearing.
